<small>Also see: **<big>[[H5969|עֻלְפֶּה]]</big>**</small>

 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָלַף‎</span>] **verb** ==cover== (Late Hebrew ***id., cover, faint***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***smear***, II. ***cover***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***sheath***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***elpitu***</u></abbr>, ***pining***, ***exhaustion***); — 

**Pu\`al** ***Participle*** feminine ***covered, encrusted***, construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְעֻלֶּפֶת‎</span> [[Song.5.14|Song 5:14]] his belly if ivory ***encrusted with*** sapphires. ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּנַיִךְ עֻלְּפוּ‎</span> [[Isa.51.20|Isa 51:20]] ***thy sons are enshrouded, enwrapped***, i.e. their senses obscured = ***have swooned away***; so also [[Ezek.31.15|Ezek 31:15]], reading 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֻלָּ֑פָה‎</span> for substantive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֻלְפֶּה‎</span> ([[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>ii. 1, 118</sup>), all the trees ***have fainted*** for (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span>) him (so [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] [[BDB#Vg|ᵑ9]] [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] [[BDB#Co|Co]] and others). **Hithpa\`el** ***enwrap oneself, Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתִּתְעַלָּ֑ף‎</span> [[Gen.38.14|Gen 38:14]] ([[BDB#J|J]]); = ***swoon away***, 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּתְעַלָּ֑ף‎</span> [[Jonah.4.8|Jonah 4:8]] 3 feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּתְעַלַּפְנָה‎</span> [[Amos.8.13|Amos 8:13]].
